con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="CustomerService" targetNamespace="com.flyinghigh/operations/customerservice" xmlns:cus="com.flyinghigh/operations/customerservice" xmlns:tns="com.flyinghigh/operations/customerservice" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/"> <wsdl:documentation> <abstractWSDL>http://soa2admin2.example.com:8001/soa-infra/services/default/CustomerService!1.0/WSDLs/CustomerService.wsdl</abstractWSDL> </wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:import namespace="com.flyinghigh/operations/customerservice" schemaLocation="http://soa2admin2.example.com:8001/soa-infra/services/default/CustomerService/CustomerService?XSD=../Schemas/CustomerService.xsd"/> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="submitComplaintRequestMessage"> <wsdl:part name="part1" element="cus:submitComplaintRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="submitComplaintResponseMessage"> <wsdl:part name="part1" element="cus:submitComplaintResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="CustomerService_ptt"> <wsdl:operation name="submitComplaint"> <wsdl:input message="cus:submitComplaintRequestMessage"/> <wsdl:output message="cus:submitComplaintResponseMessage"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="CustomerService_pttBinding" type="cus:CustomerService_ptt"> <soap:binding transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="submitComplaint"> <soap:operation style="document" soapAction="submitComplaint"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="CustomerService"> <wsdl:port name="CustomerService_pt" binding="cus:CustomerService_pttBinding"> <soap:address location="http://soa2admin2.example.com:8001/soa-infra/services/default/CustomerService/CustomerService"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="com.flyinghigh/operations/customerservice" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:cus="com.flyinghigh/operations/customerservice" xmlns:com="com.flyinghigh/operations/common"> <xsd:import namespace="com.flyinghigh/operations/common" schemaLocation="http://soa2admin2.example.com:8001/soa-infra/services/default/CustomerService/CustomerService?XSD=../Schemas/Common.xsd"/> <xsd:element name="submitComplaintRequest" type="cus:submitComplaintRequestType"/> <xsd:element name="submitComplaintResponse" type="cus:submitComplaintResponseType"/> <xsd:complexType name="submitComplaintRequestType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="FlightCode" nillable="false" type="com:flightCodeType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="FlightDate" nillable="false" type="xsd:date" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="ComplaintTimestamp" nillable="false" type="xsd:dateTime" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="Passenger" nillable="false" type="com:passengerType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="Description" nillable="false" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="EmailAddress" nillable="false" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="SuggestedCompensation" nillable="false" type="xsd:float" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="submitComplaintResponseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="CustomerServiceTrackingId" nillable="false" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="com.flyinghigh/operations/common" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:com="com.flyinghigh/operations/common"> <xsd:complexType name="passengerListType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="TotalNumberOfPassengers" nillable="false" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="Passengers" nillable="false" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Passenger" nillable="false" type="com:passengerType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="passengerType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="FirstName" nillable="false" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="LastName" nillable="false" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="Country" nillable="false" type="com:countryCodeType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="FrequentFlyerNumber" nillable="false" type="com:frequentFlyerNumberType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="Seat" nillable="false" type="com:seatType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="airportType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="IATACode" nillable="false" type="com:iataAirportType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="Name" nillable="false" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="Country" type="com:countryCodeType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="City" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="alpha3Type"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>3-char uppercase strings only</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:length value="3"/> <xsd:pattern value="[A-Z]{3}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="iataAirportType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>the code is the three letter IATA identification for airports; see for example http://www.world-airport-codes.com/ and http://www.iata.org/publications/Pages/code-search.aspx</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="com:alpha3Type"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="flightStatusType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="Idle"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Boarding"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Boarding Complete"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Closed"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="flightCodeType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="CarrierCode" nillable="false" type="com:carrierCodeType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="FlightNumber" nillable="false" type="com:flightNumberType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="flightNumberType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A flight number. Flight numbers are integer values within the range of [0-9999]. Example: 1234</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:integer"> <xsd:minInclusive value="0"/> <xsd:maxInclusive value="9999"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="frequentFlyerNumberType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The frequent flyer number type</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:length value="12"/> <xsd:pattern value="[A-Z]{1}[0-9]{6,11}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="carrierCodeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>the code is the two letter IATA identification for airlines (carriers); see for example http://www.iata.org/publications/Pages/code-search.aspx; http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Airline_codes-All</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="com:alpha2Type"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="seatType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Seat indication, from 1A to 99M</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:length value="3"/> <xsd:pattern value="[0-9]{1,2}[A-M]{1}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="countryCodeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>the code is the unique two letter ISO 3166-1 indication for a country - see http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2 and http://www.iso.org/iso/home/standards/country_codes.htm</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="com:alpha2Type"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="alpha2Type"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>2-char uppercase strings only</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:length value="2"/> <xsd:pattern value="[A-Z]{2}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:schema>

con:call.name: Request 1
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:cus="com.flyinghigh/operations/customerservice" xmlns:com="com.flyinghigh/operations/common"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <cus:submitComplaintRequest> <cus:FlightCode> <!--Optional:--> <com:CarrierCode>KL</com:CarrierCode> <!--Optional:--> <com:FlightNumber>37</com:FlightNumber> </cus:FlightCode> <!--Optional:--> <cus:FlightDate>2015-03-04</cus:FlightDate> <cus:ComplaintTimestamp>2015-03-04T15:25:00</cus:ComplaintTimestamp> <cus:Passenger> <com:FirstName>Lucas</com:FirstName> <com:LastName>Jellema</com:LastName> <!--Optional:--> <com:Country>NL</com:Country> <com:FrequentFlyerNumber>673267-8127</com:FrequentFlyerNumber> <!--Optional:--> <com:Seat>14B</com:Seat> </cus:Passenger> <cus:Description>Very annoying, loud, smelly and extremely large neighbour in 14A.</cus:Description> <!--Optional:--> <cus:EmailAddress>lucas.jellema@amis.nl</cus:EmailAddress> <!--Optional:--> <cus:SuggestedCompensation>250</cus:SuggestedCompensation> </cus:submitComplaintRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
